context: An alert was triggered indicating that an individual accessed a sensitive DKM key related to an ADFS object with the ID 4cac49d3-29d3-407e-8c9b-b7ebb21541b2. The SID linked to this activity is `S-2-5-21-571436798-3864380397-1837441745-3206` and the associated Azure AD UserID is `ec3ec68b-fdeb-4fe4-9a29-acd445e1ccc5`.
question: Identify the account name associated with the action of reading the DKM key for the specified ADFS object.
solution_steps: The account `gsmith` read the DKM key of the ADFS object with id `4cac49d3-29d3-407e-8c9b-b7ebb21541b2`.
